DESCRIPTION:
You can display your collection with the command "sc"
- Your collection can be sorted by Name, Cosmetics, Stats and more
- It can also be filtered by "Wishlist", "Gen" or "Tag" Name
- Use the command "sc t:ut" to display all untagged cards in your collection
SLASH_DESC: Select a user in order to see their collection
SLASH_DESC2: Enter the filters you want to apply to the collection
NO_CARDS_FOUND: {{author}} Could not find any cards matching your search criteria
TAG_MODAL_PLACEHOLDER: Use a "-" to mass remove a "Tag" instead
TAG_NO_CARDS_FOUND: {{author}} Could not find any cards with the `Tag`: `{{arg}}`
MASSTAG_WRONG_TAG: {{author}} Could not find any Tag with the name: {{arg}}
ALL_UNTAG_SUCCESS: {{author}} Successfully removed the `{{tagName}}` `Tag` to all **{{taglength}}** cards
ALL_TAG_SUCCESS: {{author}} Successfully added the `{{tagName}}` `Tag` to all **{{taglength}}** cards
NO_TAG_FOUND: {{author}} You don't have any `Tags` yet. Use the command `{{prefix}}tc <TagName> <Emoji>` to create one
